question:
You would like to invite your friend from abroad to a public event in your country. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,



- Invite him/her to the event
- Explain why you think he/she would like the event
- Tell him/her about the other activities you can do.
text: I hope this letter finds you well at home. I would like to invite you to our country's biggest event, organised on 26 January.

This is an important date for India. Since it is our 'Republic Day' and the Indian constitution was implemented on this day, in 1950. For all Indian citizens, this is considered to be a proud day and it has been celebrated every year in India's capital Delhi at Red Fort.

I am certainly sure that you are going to love this event.As you are always fascinated by Indian Culture, you will get the chance to see the diverse culture of our nation.Numerous people will perform there according to the custom of their provinces Moreover, the Indian Prime minister will address  the country's Army, Navy and Airforce.The defence will display their powers with tanks and guns.Air jets will spread tri colours of the Indian Flag in the sky and perform spectacular flying skills.

Apart from this, there are many other things we will do on that day.We will fly the kites which generally people do on this date.We will try several old cuisines of the old Delhi area which are famous for their delicious taste and rich spices.I will also escort you to many monuments in the city.
I hope you will have a wonderful time here so don't miss this chance.
